home.title: Diyor Market - Grocery Delivery in 30 Minutes or Less
home.description: Order fresh groceries online with Diyor Market and get them delivered to your doorstep in 30 minutes or less. Enjoy fresh fruits, vegetables, dairy, and more.

products.title: Shop Groceries Online | Diyor Market
products.description: Browse our wide selection of fresh groceries, produce, dairy, bakery items and more. Fast delivery and high quality guaranteed.

product.title: {{productName}} | Diyor Market
product.description: Buy {{productName}} online. Fresh, high-quality products delivered to your door in 30 minutes or less.

checkout.title: Checkout | Diyor Market
checkout.description: Complete your purchase and get your groceries delivered fast.

account.title: My Account | Diyor Market
account.description: Manage your account, view orders, update preferences and more.

hero.title: Fresh Groceries Delivered in 30 Minutes or Less
hero.subtitle: The freshest ingredients from local farms and stores delivered right to your doorstep.

vegetables.title: Fresh Vegetables
vegetables.description: Up to 30% off on fresh, organic vegetables this week!

mealKits.title: Meal Kits
mealKits.description: Try our new meal kits with easy recipes and pre-measured ingredients!

products.tryAdjustingFilters: Try adjusting your filters or search term

product.allergensText: This product may contain traces of nuts, wheat, and soy.
product.storageText: Store in a cool, dry place. Refrigerate after opening.
product.reviewSample1: Great quality product. Very fresh and tasty. Will definitely buy again!
product.reviewSample2: Good product but the packaging could be improved. Overall satisfied with the purchase.
product.defaultDescription: Fresh and high-quality product, carefully selected for your enjoyment.
product.longDescription: Our products are sourced from local farms to ensure maximum freshness and quality. We carefully select each item to meet our high standards, so you can enjoy the best possible experience with every purchase.
product.notFoundMessage: The product you're looking for doesn't exist or has been removed.

cart.emptyCartMessage: Start adding items to your cart to see them here.

delivery.title: 30-Minute Delivery
delivery.description: Get your groceries delivered in 30 minutes or less, right to your doorstep.

fresh.title: Fresh Products
fresh.description: We source directly from local farms and suppliers for the freshest products.

satisfaction.title: Satisfaction Guaranteed
satisfaction.description: Not happy with your order? We'll replace it or refund you, no questions asked.

appPromotion.title: Download Our Mobile App
appPromotion.description: Get exclusive deals and a better shopping experience with our mobile app. Track your deliveries in real-time and reorder with one tap. Stay tuned!

comingSoonDialog.title: Mobile App Coming Soon
comingSoonDialog.description: Our native apps are in development. In the meantime, you can add Diyor Market to your home screen for an app-like experience.
comingSoonDialog.iosInstructions: iOS: Tap Share → Add to Home Screen.
comingSoonDialog.androidInstructions: Android: Open menu (⋮) → Add to Home screen.

checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.dragPin: Drag the pin to your exact location
checkout.saveAddressForFuture: Save this address for future orders
checkout.asapDescription: Get your order delivered within 30 minutes
checkout.scheduledDescription: Choose a delivery time that works for you
checkout.contactFreeDescription: Delivery person will leave your order at the door
checkout.deliveryNotesPlaceholder: Add any special instructions for delivery
checkout.nameOnCardPlaceholder: Enter the name on your card
checkout.termsConditionsMessage: By placing your order, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
checkout.promoCodeHint: Enter a valid promo code to get discounts
checkout.orderConfirmedMessage: Your order has been successfully placed and will be delivered soon.
checkout.redirectMessage: You will be redirected to the homepage in a few seconds...
checkout.emptyCartMessage: You need to add items to your cart before proceeding to checkout.
checkout.guestNotice: You're checking out as a guest. You can create an account after purchase to save your details.

map.instruction1: Click anywhere on the map to place the marker
map.instruction2: Drag the red marker to your exact location
map.instruction3: Use the button below to get your current location

account.personalInfoDescription: Update your personal details and contact information
account.orderHistoryDescription: View and track all your past and current orders
account.noOrdersDescription: You haven't placed any orders yet. Start shopping to see them here.
account.savedAddressesDescription: Manage and edit your delivery addresses
account.noAddressesDescription: You don't have any saved addresses yet. Add one to make checkout faster.
account.noPaymentMethodsDescription: You don't have any saved payment methods yet. Add one to make checkout faster.
account.favoriteItemsDescription: View and manage your favorite products
account.noFavoritesDescription: You haven't added any products to your favorites yet.
account.notificationPreferencesDescription: Manage how and when you want to be notified
account.orderUpdatesDescription: Get notified about order status changes and delivery updates
account.promotionsDescription: Receive emails about special offers, discounts, and promotions
account.newsletterDescription: Get a weekly roundup of new products and seasonal specials
account.pushOrderUpdatesDescription: Receive real-time updates about your orders on your device
account.pushPromotionsDescription: Get notified about special offers and deals on your device
account.accountSettingsDescription: Manage your account preferences and settings
account.darkModeDescription: Switch between light and dark mode
account.deleteAccountDescription: Once you delete your account, all your data will be permanently removed. This action cannot be undone.

footer.tagline: Get fresh groceries delivered to your doorstep in 30 minutes or less from Diyor Market.

auth.welcomeDescription: Access your account or create a new one
auth.signInDescription: Sign in to your account or create a new one
auth.registerError: Registration failed. Username or email may already exist.

empty.title: No Orders Yet
empty.description: You haven't placed any orders yet. Start shopping to see your orders here.

error.title: Error Loading Orders
error.message: Failed to load orders. Please try again.

reviews.title: Reviews
reviews.loginRequired: Please login to write a review
reviews.noReviews: No reviews yet. Be the first to review!
